ID_SPARX_ERROR_UNKNOWN,An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS,Your email or password was entered incorrectly
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NAME_SHORT,Name must be between 3 and 12 characters
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NAME_TAKEN,Name has already been taken
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NAME_INVALID,Name contains invalid characters
ID_SPARX_ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH,Password must be at least 7 characters,
ID_SPARX_ERROR_PASSWORDS_DONT_MATCH,Passwords don't match
ID_SPARX_ERROR_ACCOUNT_EXISTS,Account already exists. Please login.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_ACCOUNT_DOESNT_EXISTS,Account does not exist
ID_SPARX_ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL,Please enter a valid email address.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NOT_CONNECTED,Could not connect to the Internet. Please check your connection and try again.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_SESSION,Your session has timed out. You will now be returned to the home screen.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FAILED_DNS,Failed to resolve network address. Please check your network settings and try again.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_MASTER_SERVER_UNKNOWN,Failed to find master server for private game.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NOT_JOINABLE,Failed to join game. The game has already started.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_LOST_CONNECT,The connection to the game was lost
ID_SPARX_ERROR_JOIN_GAME,Failed to join game. Please check your network settings and try again.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_GAME_KICKED,You have been kicked from the game.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_NOFREEGAMES,All servers are full. Please try again later.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_DUPLICATE_LOGIN,You have been logged out because signed in on another device.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_MUST_BE_LOGGED_IN,You must be signed in to to purchase items.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FAILED_TO_VERIFY_PAYMENT,Failed to verify payment. Please try again later.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_PROFANITY,Profanities are not allowed.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_GAME_LOST_CONNECTION,You have lost connection to the game.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FACEBOOK,Failed to fetch information from Facebook. Please try again.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FACEBOOK_INIT,Facebook failed to initialize.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_EMAIL_RESET,An email has been sent to {0} with instructions to reset your password.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FACEBOOK_CANCELED,Login with Facebook has been canceled.
ID_SPARX_ERROR_FACEBOOK,Failed to login with Facebook. Please try again later.
